alert.note: Alert for McLean; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 3:54PM CDT until August 23 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ward County in north central North Dakota... Northeastern McLean County in south central North Dakota... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Max, or 17 miles north of Garrison, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Max around 405 PM CDT. Benedict around 420 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ruso. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
